SQLResource.query: INSERT INTO BR0010 ( SEQ_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,WRITER ,WRITE_NO ,REG_IP ,FILE_NM ,REG_DATE ,MOD_DATE ,VIEW_CNT ) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO + 1), 1) FROM BR0010) ,:TITLE ,:CONTENT ,:WRITER ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(WRITE_NO + 1), 1) FROM BR0010 WHERE WRITER = :WRITER) ,:REG_IP ,:FILE_NM ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,0)
